https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: Watch this video, then go on to the next level.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Create your dancer and code them do a new dance move!** Click Run to start dancing.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Add blocks to create your dancer and code them to do a new dance move!** - Click Run to start dancing.

authored_hints.HInt2: The dancer should be the same on both blocks and the sequence (order) is important.
authored_hints.validation: Add these blocks to setup to create your first dancer: "CAT" {x: 200, y: 200} "CAT" MOVES.Roll -1

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**A.I. can help you create fun visual effects for your dance party!**
Connect the `A.I. generate effect` block to setup. Then click on the block to get started.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **A.I. can help you create fun visual effects for your dance party!** - Connect the A.I. generate effect block to setup. - Click on the block to get started.

authored_hints.Hint2: Connect the [blockly block][0] block into setup. Then click on it to get started.
authored_hints.Hint3: If you want to regenerate the effect or change the emojis you can click on the [blockly block][0] block again.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Use A.I. to generate a new effect for a different song.**
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Use A.I. to generate a new effect for a different song.** - Connect the A.I. generate effect block to setup. - Click on the block to get started.

authored_hints.Hint1: Listen to the song and think about the mood of the music.
authored_hints.Hint2: Connect the [blockly block][0] into setup. Then click on it to get started.
authored_hints.Hint3: If you want to regenerate the effect or change the emojis you can click on the [blockly block][0] block again.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**You can customize the effect A.I. creates!**
Click the emojis on the block. Then either `Regenerate`, `Use code`, or `Start over`.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **A.I. gets you started. You can customize the effect it creates!** - Click the emojis to try one of these: - `Regenerate` A.I. will recommend a different effect based on the same emojis. - `Use code` Use the code A.I. writes and customize it! - `Start over` Choose three new emojis to generate a new effect.

authored_hints.Hint1: Customize the effect by clicking emojis on the [blockly block][0] block in the workspace.
authored_hints.HintEdit: If you would like to use the code A.I. writes, toggle to show the code and then click `Use code`. The blocks will replace the [blockly block][0] block in your workspace.
authored_hints.Hint2: **Still stuck?** Watch the video to see how you can customize the effect.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**Try it out!** 
Press Run. Then press the right or left arrow ◀ ▶ to cue your dancers to move.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Try it out! You control the dance moves.** - Press Run to start the song. - Then press the right or left arrow ◀ ▶ to cue your dancers to move.

authored_hints.hint1: Your dancers won’t respond to your cues unless the dance is running.
authored_hints.hint2: After you press Run, cue your dancers by pressing the ◀ ▶ right or left arrow.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Code your dancer to move when you press a key.**
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Your turn! Code your dancer to move when you press a key.** - Attach sprites do dance move under the when up pressed event. - Make sure to press the ▲ button or your “up arrow” key after clicking Run.

authored_hints.hint1: **Still stuck?** Watch the events video again to learn how they work.
authored_hints.hint2: Here’s an example of what your code could look like. "up" "BEAR" MOVES.Dab -1

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Try it out:** The effects change at specific times in the song!
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Try it out: The effects change at specific times in the song!** - Press Run to start the song. - Watch the effects change at measure 3 and again at measure 5.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions: **Code your dance to change effects at specific times in the song.**
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions: **Your turn! Code your dance to change effects at specific times in the song.** - Connect an A.I. generate effect block to the at 2 measures event in your workspace. - Press Run to watch the effect change at measure 2.

authored_hints.hint1: Connect an A.I. generate effect block to the at 2 measures event in your workspace like this: [blockly block][0]
authored_hints.hint2: Click on the [blockly block][0] block to make a new effect.

callouts.dance_callout_02: Add the A.I. generate effect block here.

https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.short_instructions:
**Get creative!**
Now use the skills you just learned and A.I. to keep the dance party going.
https://studio.code.org/s/dance-ai-2023/.long_instructions:
### **Nice work!**

-   Now use the skills you just learned and A.I. to keep the dance party going. Get creative!
